column4: Today I upgraded to 10.04 but now PHP isn't working anymore on my localhost. Apache is running and it serves static HTML pages and phpmyadmin but PHP files hosted on public_html folder are just being downloaded by the browser, unparsed. user_dir mod is enable too.

Today I upgraded to 10.04 but now PHP isn't working anymore on my localhost. Apache is running and it serves static HTML pages and phpmyadmin but PHP files hosted on public_html folder are just being downloaded by the browser, unparsed. user_dir mod is enable too.
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
